words: NO ONE WHO IS HIMSELF HONEST WILL DOUBT MY BEING SO

name: 2412-153948-0003.flac
words: I REACHED MY DESTINATION IN ONE OF THE LAST MONTHS OF EIGHTEEN SIXTY EIGHT BUT I DARE NOT MENTION THE SEASON LEST THE READER SHOULD GATHER IN WHICH HEMISPHERE I WAS

name: 2412-153948-0004.flac
words: SHEEP AND CATTLE WERE INTRODUCED AND BRED WITH EXTREME RAPIDITY MEN TOOK UP THEIR FIFTY THOUSAND OR ONE HUNDRED THOUSAND ACRES OF COUNTRY GOING INLAND ONE BEHIND THE OTHER TILL IN A FEW YEARS THERE WAS NOT AN ACRE BETWEEN THE SEA AND THE FRONT RANGES WHICH WAS NOT TAKEN UP AND STATIONS EITHER FOR SHEEP OR CATTLE WERE SPOTTED ABOUT AT INTERVALS OF SOME TWENTY OR THIRTY MILES OVER THE WHOLE COUNTRY

name: 2412-153948-0005.flac
words: I WAS DELIGHTED WITH THE COUNTRY AND THE MANNER OF LIFE

name: 2412-153948-0006.flac
words: I WAS TO SEE THE SHEEP NOT NECESSARILY CLOSE AT HAND NOR TO GET THEM IN A SINGLE MOB BUT TO SEE ENOUGH OF THEM HERE AND THERE TO FEEL EASY THAT NOTHING HAD GONE WRONG THIS WAS NO DIFFICULT MATTER FOR THERE WERE NOT ABOVE EIGHT HUNDRED OF THEM AND BEING ALL BREEDING EWES THEY WERE PRETTY QUIET

name: 2412-153948-0007.flac
words: THERE WERE A GOOD MANY SHEEP WHICH I KNEW AS TWO OR THREE BLACK EWES AND A BLACK LAMB OR TWO AND SEVERAL OTHERS WHICH HAD SOME DISTINGUISHING MARK WHEREBY I COULD TELL THEM

name: 2412-153948-0008.flac
words: IT IS SURPRISING HOW SOON THE EYE BECOMES ACCUSTOMED TO MISSING TWENTY SHEEP OUT OF TWO OR THREE HUNDRED

name: 2412-153948-0009.flac
words: IT WAS A MONOTONOUS LIFE BUT IT WAS VERY HEALTHY AND ONE DOES NOT MUCH MIND ANYTHING WHEN ONE IS WELL

name: 2412-153948-0010.flac
words: THE COUNTRY WAS THE GRANDEST THAT CAN BE IMAGINED

name: 2412-153948-0011.flac
words: SO LONELY AND SO SOLEMN WITH THE SAD GREY CLOUDS ABOVE AND NO SOUND SAVE A LOST LAMB BLEATING UPON THE MOUNTAIN SIDE AS THOUGH ITS LITTLE HEART WERE BREAKING

name: 2412-153948-0012.flac
words: EACH MUST CRY LOUDER AND WANDER FARTHER YET MAY LUCK BE WITH THEM BOTH THAT THEY MAY FIND THEIR OWN AT NIGHTFALL

name: 2412-153948-0013.flac
words: I HAD NO MONEY BUT IF I COULD ONLY FIND WORKABLE COUNTRY I MIGHT STOCK IT WITH BORROWED CAPITAL AND CONSIDER MYSELF A MADE MAN

name: 2412-153948-0014.flac
words: THERE WAS NO ONE IN THE WHOLE WORLD WHO HAD THE SMALLEST IDEA SAVE THOSE WHO WERE THEMSELVES ON THE OTHER SIDE OF IT IF INDEED THERE WAS ANY ONE AT ALL COULD I HOPE TO CROSS IT

name: 2412-153948-0015.flac
words: I WOULD TRY THE NEARER RANGE AND SEE HOW FAR I COULD GO

name: 2412-153954-0000.flac
words: SHORTLY AFTER PASSING ONE OF THESE CHAPELS WE CAME SUDDENLY UPON A VILLAGE WHICH STARTED UP OUT OF THE MIST AND I WAS ALARMED LEST I SHOULD BE MADE AN OBJECT OF CURIOSITY OR DISLIKE

name: 2412-153954-0001.flac
words: MY GUIDES HOWEVER WERE WELL KNOWN AND THE NATURAL POLITENESS OF THE PEOPLE PREVENTED THEM FROM PUTTING ME TO ANY INCONVENIENCE BUT THEY COULD NOT HELP EYEING ME NOR I THEM

name: 2412-153954-0002.flac
words: THE STREETS WERE NARROW AND UNPAVED BUT VERY FAIRLY CLEAN

name: 2412-153954-0003.flac
words: THE VINE GREW OUTSIDE MANY OF THE HOUSES AND THERE WERE SOME WITH SIGN BOARDS ON WHICH WAS PAINTED A BOTTLE AND A GLASS THAT MADE ME FEEL MUCH AT HOME

name: 2412-153954-0004.flac
words: EVEN ON THIS LEDGE OF HUMAN SOCIETY THERE WAS A STUNTED GROWTH OF SHOPLETS WHICH HAD TAKEN ROOT AND VEGETATED SOMEHOW THOUGH AS IN AN AIR MERCANTILE OF THE BLEAKEST

name: 2412-153954-0005.flac
words: EACH FEATURE WAS FINISHED EYELIDS EYELASHES AND EARS BEING ALMOST INVARIABLY PERFECT

name: 2412-153954-0006.flac
words: THEIR EXPRESSION WAS DIVINE AND AS THEY GLANCED AT ME TIMIDLY BUT WITH PARTED LIPS IN GREAT BEWILDERMENT I FORGOT ALL THOUGHTS OF THEIR CONVERSION IN FEELINGS THAT WERE FAR MORE EARTHLY

name: 2412-153954-0007.flac
words: EVEN IN MIDDLE AGE THEY WERE STILL COMELY AND THE OLD GREY HAIRED WOMEN AT THEIR COTTAGE DOORS HAD A DIGNITY NOT TO SAY MAJESTY OF THEIR OWN

name: 2412-153954-0008.flac
words: THE MEN WERE AS HANDSOME AS THE WOMEN BEAUTIFUL

name: 2412-153954-0009.flac
words: I HAVE ALWAYS DELIGHTED IN AND REVERENCED BEAUTY BUT I FELT SIMPLY ABASHED IN THE PRESENCE OF SUCH A SPLENDID TYPE A COMPOUND OF ALL THAT IS BEST IN EGYPTIAN GREEK AND ITALIAN

name: 2412-153954-0010.flac
words: THE CHILDREN WERE INFINITE IN NUMBER AND EXCEEDINGLY MERRY I NEED HARDLY SAY THAT THEY CAME IN FOR THEIR FULL SHARE OF THE PREVAILING BEAUTY

name: 2412-153954-0011.flac
words: I EXPRESSED BY SIGNS MY ADMIRATION AND PLEASURE TO MY GUIDES AND THEY WERE GREATLY PLEASED

name: 2412-153954-0012.flac
words: THE COUNTRY WAS HIGHLY CULTIVATED EVERY LEDGE BEING PLANTED WITH CHESTNUTS WALNUTS AND APPLE TREES FROM WHICH THE APPLES WERE NOW GATHERING

name: 2412-153954-0013.flac
words: I SAW A FEW SHEEP WITH ROUNDED NOSES AND ENORMOUS TAILS

name: 2412-153954-0014.flac
words: IN ABOUT FOUR HOURS OF WALKING FROM THE TIME WE STARTED AND AFTER PASSING TWO OR THREE MORE VILLAGES WE CAME UPON A CONSIDERABLE TOWN AND MY GUIDES MADE MANY ATTEMPTS TO MAKE ME UNDERSTAND SOMETHING BUT I GATHERED NO INKLING OF THEIR MEANING EXCEPT THAT I NEED BE UNDER NO APPREHENSION OF DANGER

name: 2412-153954-0015.flac
words: SUFFICE IT THAT I FOUND MYSELF TAKEN BEFORE THE CHIEF MAGISTRATE AND BY HIS ORDERS WAS PLACED IN AN APARTMENT WITH TWO OTHER PEOPLE WHO WERE THE FIRST I HAD SEEN LOOKING ANYTHING BUT WELL AND HANDSOME

name: 2412-153954-0016.flac
words: IN FACT ONE OF THEM WAS PLAINLY VERY MUCH OUT OF HEALTH AND COUGHED VIOLENTLY FROM TIME TO TIME IN SPITE OF MANIFEST EFFORTS TO SUPPRESS IT

name: 2412-153954-0017.flac
words: THE OTHER LOOKED PALE AND ILL BUT HE WAS MARVELLOUSLY SELF CONTAINED AND IT WAS IMPOSSIBLE TO SAY WHAT WAS THE MATTER WITH HIM

name: 2412-153954-0018.flac
words: THEY FELT MY PULSE THEY LOOKED AT MY TONGUE THEY LISTENED AT MY CHEST THEY FELT ALL MY MUSCLES AND AT THE END OF EACH OPERATION THEY LOOKED AT THE CHIEF AND NODDED AND SAID SOMETHING IN A TONE QUITE PLEASANT AS THOUGH I WERE ALL RIGHT

name: 2412-153954-0019.flac
words: BUT BY AND BY THEY CAME TO MY WATCH WHICH I HAD HIDDEN AWAY IN THE INMOST POCKET THAT I HAD AND HAD FORGOTTEN WHEN THEY BEGAN THEIR SEARCH

name: 2412-153954-0020.flac
words: AGAIN THERE WAS A VERY OLD CARRIAGE WHOSE WHEELS IN SPITE OF RUST AND DECAY I COULD SEE HAD BEEN DESIGNED ORIGINALLY FOR IRON RAILS

name: 2412-153954-0021.flac
words: WE PASSED MANY CASES AND AT LAST CAME TO ONE IN WHICH THERE WERE SEVERAL CLOCKS AND TWO OR THREE OLD WATCHES

name: 2412-153954-0022.flac
words: THE DESIGN WAS DIFFERENT BUT THE THING WAS CLEARLY THE SAME

name: 2412-153954-0023.flac
words: THIS HAD SOME EFFECT IN CALMING HIM

name: 2412-153954-0024.flac
words: HE BEGAN PRESENTLY TO RELENT AND SPOKE TO ME IN A KINDER MANNER

name: 6241-61943-0000.flac
words: ON THE SECOND OF THE MONTH AT TWO IN THE MORNING OUR PRECIOUS CARGO OF LUGGAGE WAS TAKEN ON BOARD THE GOOD SHIP VALKYRIE

name: 6241-61943-0001.flac
words: BUT IN THE CAUSE OF SCIENCE MEN ARE EXPECTED TO SUFFER

name: 6241-61943-0002.flac
words: WELL AND HAVE WE A FAIR WIND

name: 6241-61943-0003.flac
words: MY UNCLE WAS DELIGHTED FOR MYSELF MOODY AND DISSATISFIED I APPEARED ALMOST TO EXPECT A GLIMPSE OF THE GHOST OF HAMLET

name: 6241-61943-0004.flac
words: BUT NO GHOST OR ANYTHING ELSE APPEARED UPON THE ANCIENT WALLS

name: 6241-61943-0005.flac
words: THE FACT IS THE CASTLE IS MUCH LATER THAN THE TIME OF THE HEROIC PRINCE OF DENMARK

name: 6241-61943-0006.flac
words: NO MISTER HARDWIGG SAID THE CAPTAIN NO FEAR OF THAT

name: 6241-61943-0007.flac
words: AT ALL EVENTS WE SHALL GET THERE SOME DAY

name: 6241-61943-0008.flac
words: ON THE ELEVENTH DAY WE SIGHTED CAPE PORTLAND OVER WHICH TOWERED MOUNT MYRDALS YOKUL WHICH THE WEATHER BEING CLEAR WE MADE OUT VERY READILY

name: 6241-61943-0009.flac
words: THE VALKYRIE KEPT OFF THE COAST STEERING TO THE WESTWARD

name: 6241-61943-0010.flac
words: ON ALL SIDES WERE TO BE SEEN WHOLE SCHOOLS OF WHALES AND SHARKS

name: 6241-61943-0011.flac
words: NEARLY THE WHOLE POPULATION OF THE TOWN WAS ON FOOT TO SEE US LAND

name: 6241-61943-0012.flac
words: THE FACT WAS THAT SCARCELY ANY ONE OF THEM BUT EXPECTED SOME GOODS BY THE PERIODICAL VESSEL

name: 6241-61943-0013.flac
words: THEN WITHOUT FURTHER REMARK HE PUT HIS FINGER TO HIS LIPS FROWNED DARKLY AND DESCENDED INTO THE SMALL BOAT WHICH AWAITED US

name: 6241-61943-0014.flac
words: HE WAS HOWEVER BUT A CIVIL SERVANT A MAGISTRATE THE GOVERNOR OF THE ISLAND BARON TRAMPE

name: 6241-61943-0015.flac
words: THE PROFESSOR KNEW WHOM HE HAD TO DEAL WITH

name: 6241-61943-0016.flac
words: THIS MODEST SCHOLAR SPOKE NO LANGUAGES SAVE ICELANDIC AND LATIN

name: 6241-61943-0017.flac
words: WHEN THEREFORE HE ADDRESSED HIMSELF TO ME IN THE LANGUAGE OF HORACE WE AT ONCE CAME TO UNDERSTAND ONE ANOTHER

name: 6241-61943-0018.flac
words: NOW HARRY SAID MY UNCLE RUBBING HIS HANDS AN GOES WELL THE WORSE DIFFICULTY IS NOW OVER

name: 6241-61943-0019.flac
words: IN THE MEANTIME THERE IS NOT AN HOUR TO LOSE

name: 6241-61943-0020.flac
words: VERY LIKELY I MAY FIND THERE SOME MANUSCRIPTS FROM THE HAND OF SAKNUSSEMM

name: 6241-61943-0021.flac
words: I SHALL BE GLAD TO CONSULT THEM

name: 6241-61943-0022.flac
words: THEY WERE NOW HOWEVER ABSENT ON DUTY

name: 6241-61943-0023.flac
words: THOUGH NOT VERY LARGE IT APPEARED NOT LIKELY TO BE FILLED FOR CENTURIES

name: 6241-61943-0024.flac
words: I HAVE NOT THE SLIGHTEST DOUBT THAT IN HIGH WINDS ITS RED TILES WERE BLOWN OUT TO THE GREAT ANNOYANCE OF THE PASTOR AND CONGREGATION

name: 6241-61943-0025.flac
words: THANKS TO THE HEAT OF THESE RESIDENCES GRASS GROWS ON THE ROOF WHICH GRASS IS CAREFULLY CUT FOR HAY

name: 6241-61943-0026.flac
words: I SAW BUT FEW INHABITANTS DURING MY EXCURSION BUT I MET A CROWD ON THE BEACH DRYING SALTING AND LOADING CODFISH THE PRINCIPAL ARTICLE OF EXPORTATION

name: 6241-61943-0027.flac
words: THE MEN APPEARED ROBUST BUT HEAVY FAIR HAIRED LIKE GERMANS BUT OF PENSIVE MIEN EXILES OF A HIGHER SCALE IN THE LADDER OF HUMANITY THAN THE ESKIMOS BUT I THOUGHT MUCH MORE UNHAPPY SINCE WITH SUPERIOR PERCEPTIONS THEY ARE COMPELLED TO LIVE WITHIN THE LIMITS OF THE POLAR CIRCLE

name: 6241-61946-0000.flac
words: I BEGAN TO ENJOY THE EXHILARATING DELIGHT OF TRAVELING A LIFE OF DESIRE GRATIFICATION AND LIBERTY

name: 6241-61946-0001.flac
words: HANS OUR EXTRAORDINARY GUIDE WENT FIRST WALKING WITH A STEADY RAPID UNVARYING STEP

name: 6241-61946-0002.flac
words: OUR TWO HORSES WITH THE LUGGAGE FOLLOWED OF THEIR OWN ACCORD WITHOUT REQUIRING WHIP OR SPUR

name: 6241-61946-0003.flac
words: GEOGRAPHERS HAVE DIVIDED IT INTO FOUR PARTS AND WE HAD TO CROSS THE SOUTHWEST QUARTER WHICH IN THE VERNACULAR IS CALLED SUDVESTR FJORDUNGR

name: 6241-61946-0004.flac
words: WE TOOK OUR WAY THROUGH POOR AND SPARSE MEADOWS WHICH MADE A DESPERATE EFFORT EVERY YEAR TO SHOW A LITTLE GREEN

name: 6241-61946-0005.flac
words: THEY VERY RARELY SUCCEED IN A GOOD SHOW OF YELLOW

name: 6241-61946-0006.flac
words: I COULD NOT HELP SMILING TO SEE HIM LOOK SO BIG ON HIS LITTLE HORSE HIS LONG LEGS NOW AND THEN TOUCHING THE GROUND MADE HIM LOOK LIKE A SIX FOOTED CENTAUR

name: 6241-61946-0007.flac
words: SNOW TEMPEST IMPRACTICABLE ROADS ROCKS ICEBERGS NOTHING STOPS HIM

name: 6241-61946-0008.flac
words: WE MAY DO SO WAS MY REPLY BUT WHAT ABOUT OUR WORTHY GUIDE

name: 6241-61946-0009.flac
words: I SHOULD HAVE A VIOLENT ATTACK OF THE CRAMP IF I WERE NOT TO HAVE SOME SORT OF EXERCISE

name: 6241-61946-0010.flac
words: MY ARMS ARE RIGHT BUT MY LEGS ARE GETTING A LITTLE STIFF

name: 6241-61946-0011.flac
words: HERE AND THERE COULD BE SEEN AN ISOLATED FARM SOME SOLITARY BUR OR ICELANDIC HOUSE BUILT OF WOOD EARTH FRAGMENTS OF LAVA LOOKING LIKE BEGGARS ON THE HIGHWAY OF LIFE

name: 6241-61946-0012.flac
words: A FEW STRAY COWS AND SHEEP WERE ONLY SEEN OCCASIONALLY

name: 6241-61946-0013.flac
words: LITTLE DID I EXPECT HOWEVER THE SPECTACLE WHICH AWAITED US WHEN WE REACHED THE PENINSULA OF SNEFFELS WHERE AGGLOMERATIONS OF NATURE'S RUINS FORM A KIND OF TERRIBLE CHAOS

name: 6241-61946-0014.flac
words: IT CONSISTS SIMPLY OF A FEW HOUSES NOT WHAT IN ENGLAND OR GERMANY WE SHOULD CALL A HAMLET

name: 6241-61946-0015.flac
words: I TOOK OCCASION TO CONSULT THE MAP TO SEE WHERE GARDAR WAS TO BE FOUND

name: 6241-61946-0016.flac
words: THESE SACRED EDIFICES ARE HOWEVER VERY MUCH LIKE THESE PEOPLE WHO DO WITHOUT WATCHES AND NEVER MISS THEM

name: 6241-61946-0017.flac
words: TO RIDE OVER SALT WATER UPON THE BACK OF A LITTLE HORSE SEEMED TO ME ABSURD

name: 6241-61946-0018.flac
words: IN ANY CASE I SHALL TRUST RATHER TO MY OWN INTELLIGENCE THAN THEIRS

name: 6241-61946-0019.flac
words: BUT MY UNCLE WAS IN NO HUMOR TO WAIT

name: 6241-61946-0020.flac
words: AT LENGTH THE STURDY LITTLE PONY SPREADING OUT HIS LEGS IN A STIFF AND LUDICROUS ATTITUDE GOT FROM UNDER THE PROFESSOR'S LEGS AND LEFT HIM STANDING WITH BOTH FEET ON A SEPARATE STONE LIKE THE COLOSSUS OF RHODES

name: 6241-61946-0021.flac
words: HE SAYS TIDE REPLIED MY UNCLE TRANSLATING THE DANISH WORD FOR MY INFORMATION

name: 6241-61946-0022.flac
words: I THOROUGHLY UNDERSTOOD AND APPRECIATED THE NECESSITY FOR WAITING BEFORE CROSSING THE FJORD FOR THAT MOMENT WHEN THE SEA AT ITS HIGHEST POINT IS IN A STATE OF SLACK WATER

name: 6241-61946-0023.flac
words: ACCUSTOMED AS I HAD BEEN TO THE STEAM FERRY BOATS OF THE ELBE I FOUND THE LONG OARS OF THE BOATMEN BUT SORRY MEANS OF LOCOMOTION

name: 6241-66616-0000.flac
words: BUT THIS POWER OF DISCERNMENT WAS DENIED THEM AND ONLY IN AFTER YEARS WITH THE LOVED ONES OF THEIR OWN FIRESIDES CLOSE ABOUT THEM WAS THE WHOLE PICTURE REVEALED

name: 6241-66616-0001.flac
words: ONE DARK NIGHT AT THE HEAD OF A SCORE OF HIS TRIBE HE FELL UPON WABIGOON'S CAMP HIS OBJECT BEING THE ABDUCTION OF THE PRINCESS

name: 6241-66616-0002.flac
words: WHILE THE ATTACK WAS SUCCESSFUL IN A WAY ITS MAIN PURPOSE FAILED

name: 6241-66616-0003.flac
words: A COUNTER ATTACK WAS MADE UPON WOONGA AND HE WAS DRIVEN DEEP INTO THE WILDERNESS WITH GREAT LOSS

name: 6241-66616-0004.flac
words: THREE DAYS LATER MINNETAKI BECAME NEWSOME'S WIFE AT THE HUDSON BAY POST

name: 6241-66616-0005.flac
words: FROM THAT HOUR DATED ONE OF THE MOST SANGUINARY FEUDS IN THE HISTORY OF THE GREAT TRADING COMPANY A FEUD WHICH AS WE SHALL SEE WAS DESTINED TO LIVE EVEN UNTO THE SECOND GENERATION

name: 6241-66616-0006.flac
words: MEANWHILE TWO CHILDREN CAME TO BLESS THE HAPPY UNION OF NEWSOME AND HIS LOVELY INDIAN WIFE

name: 6241-66616-0007.flac
words: THE OTHER WAS A GIRL THREE YEARS YOUNGER AND NEWSOME INSISTED THAT SHE BE CALLED MINNETAKI

name: 6241-66616-0008.flac
words: CURIOUSLY ENOUGH THE BLOOD OF WABI RAN ALMOST PURE TO HIS INDIAN FOREFATHERS WHILE MINNETAKI AS SHE BECAME OLDER DEVELOPED LESS OF THE WILD BEAUTY OF HER MOTHER AND MORE OF THE SOFTER LOVELINESS OF THE WHITE RACE HER WEALTH OF SOFT JET BLACK HAIR AND HER GREAT DARK EYES CONTRASTING WITH THE LIGHTER SKIN OF HER FATHER'S BLOOD

name: 6241-66616-0009.flac
words: WABI ON THE OTHER HAND WAS AN INDIAN IN APPEARANCE FROM HIS MOCCASINS TO THE CROWN OF HIS HEAD SWARTHY SINEWY AS AGILE AS A LYNX AND WITH EVERY INSTINCT IN HIM CRYING FOR THE LIFE OF THE WILD

name: 6241-66616-0010.flac
words: ONE OF NEWSOME'S CHIEF PLEASURES IN LIFE HAD BEEN THE EDUCATING OF HIS WOODLAND BRIDE AND IT WAS THE AMBITION OF BOTH THAT THE LITTLE MINNETAKI AND HER BROTHER BE REARED IN THE WAYS OF WHITE CHILDREN

name: 6241-66616-0011.flac
words: CONSEQUENTLY BOTH MOTHER AND FATHER BEGAN THEIR EDUCATION AT THE POST THEY WERE SENT TO THE FACTOR'S SCHOOL AND TWO WINTERS WERE PASSED IN PORT ARTHUR THAT THEY MIGHT HAVE THE ADVANTAGE OF THOROUGHLY EQUIPPED SCHOOLS

name: 6241-66616-0012.flac
words: THE CHILDREN PROVED THEMSELVES UNUSUALLY BRIGHT PUPILS AND BY THE TIME WABI WAS SIXTEEN AND MINNETAKI TWELVE ONE WOULD NOT HAVE KNOWN FROM THEIR MANNER OF SPEECH THAT INDIAN BLOOD RAN IN THEIR VEINS

name: 6241-66616-0013.flac
words: IT WAS AT ABOUT THIS TIME IN THEIR LIVES THAT THE WOONGAS BECAME ESPECIALLY DARING IN THEIR DEPREDATIONS

name: 6241-66616-0014.flac
words: AT LAST SO DARING DID HE BECOME THAT THE PROVINCIAL GOVERNMENT PLACED A PRICE UPON HIS HEAD AND UPON THOSE OF A NUMBER OF HIS MOST NOTORIOUS FOLLOWERS

name: 6241-66616-0015.flac
words: BUT EACH WEEK ADDED TO HIS LONELINESS AND HIS LONGINGS FOR MINNETAKI AND HIS FORESTS

name: 6241-66616-0016.flac
words: NECESSITY HAD BECOME HIS GRIM MASTER AND THE FOLLOWING WEEK HE WAS GOING TO WORK

name: 6241-66616-0017.flac
words: A THOUSAND PLANS WERE MADE A THOUSAND ADVENTURES PICTURED AND THE MOTHER WOULD SMILE AND LAUGH AND PLAN WITH THEM

name: 6241-66616-0018.flac
words: BUT IN TIME THE END OF IT ALL CAME AND WABI WENT BACK TO THE PRINCESS MOTHER TO MINNETAKI AND TO HIS FORESTS

name: 6241-66616-0019.flac
words: THERE WERE TEARS IN THE BOYS EYES WHEN THEY PARTED AND THE MOTHER CRIED FOR THE INDIAN BOY WHO WAS RETURNING TO HIS PEOPLE

name: 6241-66616-0020.flac
words: SPRING CAME AND PASSED AND THEN SUMMER

name: 6241-66616-0021.flac
words: WE SHALL MAKE MORE MONEY UP HERE THIS WINTER THAN YOU COULD EARN IN DETROIT IN THREE YEARS

name: 6241-66616-0022.flac
words: WE WILL HUNT WOLVES THE COUNTRY IS ALIVE WITH THEM AND THE GOVERNMENT GIVES A BOUNTY OF FIFTEEN DOLLARS FOR EVERY SCALP TAKEN

name: 6241-66616-0023.flac
words: THREE WEEKS LATER CAME WABIGOON'S REPLY

name: 6241-66616-0024.flac
words: ON THE TENTH OF OCTOBER HE WOULD MEET ROD AT SPRUCEWOOD ON THE BLACK STURGEON RIVER

name: 6241-66616-0025.flac
words: THERE WAS LITTLE TIME TO LOSE IN MAKING PREPARATIONS AND THE FOURTH DAY FOLLOWING THE RECEIPT OF WABI'S LETTER FOUND ROD AND HIS MOTHER WAITING FOR THE TRAIN WHICH WAS TO WHIRL THE BOY INTO HIS NEW LIFE

name: 1919-142785-0002.flac
words: ORIGINALLY THE MOST VALUABLE OF THESE WERE FOUND IN THE SPICE ISLANDS OR MOLUCCAS OF THE INDIAN OCEAN AND WERE HIGHLY PRIZED BY THE NATIONS OF ANTIQUITY

words: THE LONG PEPPER IS LESS AROMATIC THAN THE BLACK BUT ITS OIL IS MORE PUNGENT

words: MODE CHOOSE THE GREENEST CUCUMBERS AND THOSE THAT ARE MOST FREE FROM SEEDS PUT THEM IN STRONG SALT AND WATER WITH A CABBAGE LEAF TO KEEP THEM DOWN TIE A PAPER OVER THEM AND PUT THEM IN A WARM PLACE TILL THEY ARE YELLOW THEN WASH THEM AND SET THEM OVER THE FIRE IN FRESH WATER WITH A VERY LITTLE SALT AND ANOTHER CABBAGE LEAF OVER THEM COVER VERY CLOSELY BUT TAKE CARE THEY DO NOT BOIL

name: 1919-142785-0011.flac
words: SOME SPRINGS ARE SO HIGHLY IMPREGNATED WITH SALT AS TO HAVE RECEIVED THE NAME OF BRINE SPRINGS AND ARE SUPPOSED TO HAVE BECOME SO BY PASSING THROUGH THE SALT ROCKS BELOW GROUND AND THUS DISSOLVING A PORTION OF THIS MINERAL SUBSTANCE

words: WHEN I CAME UP HE TOUCHED MY SHOULDER AND LOOKED SEARCHINGLY DOWN INTO MY FACE FOR SEVERAL SECONDS

name: 1988-147956-0029.flac
words: I BECAME SOMEWHAT EMBARRASSED FOR I WAS USED TO BEING TAKEN FOR GRANTED BY MY ELDERS

name: 1272-141231-0000.flac
words: A MAN SAID TO THE UNIVERSE SIR I EXIST

name: 1272-141231-0001.flac
words: SWEAT COVERED BRION'S BODY TRICKLING INTO THE TIGHT LOINCLOTH THAT WAS THE ONLY GARMENT HE WORE

name: 1272-141231-0002.flac
words: THE CUT ON HIS CHEST STILL DRIPPING BLOOD THE ACHE OF HIS OVERSTRAINED EYES EVEN THE SOARING ARENA AROUND HIM WITH THE THOUSANDS OF SPECTATORS WERE TRIVIALITIES NOT WORTH THINKING ABOUT

name: 1272-141231-0003.flac
words: HIS INSTANT OF PANIC WAS FOLLOWED BY A SMALL SHARP BLOW HIGH ON HIS CHEST

name: 1272-141231-0004.flac
words: ONE MINUTE A VOICE SAID AND THE TIME BUZZER SOUNDED

name: 1272-141231-0005.flac
words: A MINUTE IS NOT A VERY LARGE MEASURE OF TIME AND HIS BODY NEEDED EVERY FRACTION OF IT

name: 1272-141231-0006.flac
words: THE BUZZER'S WHIRR TRIGGERED HIS MUSCLES INTO COMPLETE RELAXATION

name: 1272-141231-0007.flac
words: ONLY HIS HEART AND LUNGS WORKED ON AT A STRONG MEASURED RATE

name: 1272-141231-0008.flac
words: HE WAS IN REVERIE SLIDING ALONG THE BORDERS OF CONSCIOUSNESS

name: 1272-141231-0009.flac
words: THE CONTESTANTS IN THE TWENTIES NEEDED UNDISTURBED REST THEREFORE NIGHTS IN THE DORMITORIES WERE AS QUIET AS DEATH

name: 1272-141231-0010.flac
words: PARTICULARLY SO ON THIS LAST NIGHT WHEN ONLY TWO OF THE LITTLE CUBICLES WERE OCCUPIED THE THOUSANDS OF OTHERS STANDING WITH DARK EMPTY DOORS

name: 1272-141231-0011.flac
words: THE OTHER VOICE SNAPPED WITH A HARSH URGENCY CLEARLY USED TO COMMAND

name: 1272-141231-0012.flac
words: I'M HERE BECAUSE THE MATTER IS OF UTMOST IMPORTANCE AND BRANDD IS THE ONE I MUST SEE NOW STAND ASIDE

words: THE TWENTIES

name: 1272-141231-0014.flac
words: HE MUST HAVE DRAWN HIS GUN BECAUSE THE INTRUDER SAID QUICKLY PUT THAT AWAY YOU'RE BEING A FOOL OUT

name: 1272-141231-0015.flac
words: THERE WAS SILENCE THEN AND STILL WONDERING BRION WAS ONCE MORE ASLEEP

name: 1272-141231-0016.flac

name: 1272-141231-0017.flac
words: HE ASKED THE HANDLER WHO WAS KNEADING HIS ACHING MUSCLES

name: 1272-141231-0020.flac

words: THERE APPEARED TO BE AN IMMEDIATE ASSOCIATION WITH THE DEATH TRAUMA AS IF THE TWO WERE INEXTRICABLY LINKED INTO ONE

words: THIS IS PHYSICALLY IMPOSSIBLE WHEN CONSCIOUS

words: HE HAS GRAVE DOUBTS WHETHER SIR FREDERICK LEIGHTON'S WORK IS REALLY GREEK AFTER ALL AND CAN DISCOVER IN IT BUT LITTLE OF ROCKY ITHACA

words: LINNELL'S PICTURES ARE A SORT OF UP GUARDS AND AT EM PAINTINGS AND MASON'S EXQUISITE IDYLLS ARE AS NATIONAL AS A JINGO POEM MISTER BIRKET FOSTER'S LANDSCAPES SMILE AT ONE MUCH IN THE SAME WAY THAT MISTER CARKER USED TO FLASH HIS TEETH AND MISTER JOHN COLLIER GIVES HIS SITTER A CHEERFUL SLAP ON THE BACK BEFORE HE SAYS LIKE A SHAMPOOER IN A TURKISH BATH NEXT MAN

name: 1272-128104-0009.flac

words: IT WAS YOUTH AND POVERTY AND PROXIMITY AND EVERYTHING WAS YOUNG AND KINDLY

name: 1462-170142-0001.flac
words: EMERGING AT EUSTON AT HALF PAST THREE O'CLOCK IN THE AFTERNOON ALEXANDER HAD HIS LUGGAGE SENT TO THE SAVOY AND DROVE AT ONCE TO BEDFORD SQUARE

words: SHE BLUSHED AND SMILED AND FUMBLED HIS CARD IN HER CONFUSION BEFORE SHE RAN UPSTAIRS

name: 1462-170142-0003.flac
words: THE ROOM WAS EMPTY WHEN HE ENTERED

name: 1462-170142-0004.flac
words: A COAL FIRE WAS CRACKLING IN THE GRATE AND THE LAMPS WERE LIT FOR IT WAS ALREADY BEGINNING TO GROW DARK OUTSIDE

name: 1462-170142-0005.flac
words: SHE CALLED HIS NAME ON THE THRESHOLD BUT IN HER SWIFT FLIGHT ACROSS THE ROOM SHE FELT A CHANGE IN HIM AND CAUGHT HERSELF UP SO DEFTLY THAT HE COULD NOT TELL JUST WHEN SHE DID IT

name: 1462-170142-0006.flac
words: SHE MERELY BRUSHED HIS CHEEK WITH HER LIPS AND PUT A HAND LIGHTLY AND JOYOUSLY ON EITHER SHOULDER

name: 1462-170142-0007.flac
words: I NEVER DREAMED IT WOULD BE YOU BARTLEY

name: 1462-170142-0008.flac
words: WHEN DID YOU COME BARTLEY AND HOW DID IT HAPPEN YOU HAVEN'T SPOKEN A WORD

words: SHE LOOKED AT HIS HEAVY SHOULDERS AND BIG DETERMINED HEAD THRUST FORWARD LIKE A CATAPULT IN LEASH

name: 1462-170142-0010.flac
words: I'LL DO ANYTHING YOU WISH ME TO BARTLEY SHE SAID TREMULOUSLY

words: HE PULLED UP A WINDOW AS IF THE AIR WERE HEAVY

name: 3170-137482-0000.flac
words: WITH AN EDUCATION WHICH OUGHT TO HAVE ENSURED ME AN HONOURABLE STANDING IN THE WORLD WITH SOME INTELLIGENCE WIT GOOD LITERARY AND SCIENTIFIC KNOWLEDGE AND ENDOWED WITH THOSE ACCIDENTAL PHYSICAL QUALITIES WHICH ARE SUCH A GOOD PASSPORT INTO SOCIETY I FOUND MYSELF AT THE AGE OF TWENTY THE MEAN FOLLOWER OF A SUBLIME ART IN WHICH IF GREAT TALENT IS RIGHTLY ADMIRED MEDIOCRITY IS AS RIGHTLY DESPISED

name: 3170-137482-0001.flac
words: I WAS COMPELLED BY POVERTY TO BECOME A MEMBER OF A MUSICAL BAND IN WHICH I COULD EXPECT NEITHER ESTEEM NOR CONSIDERATION AND I WAS WELL AWARE THAT I SHOULD BE THE LAUGHING STOCK OF THE PERSONS WHO HAD KNOWN ME AS A DOCTOR IN DIVINITY AS AN ECCLESIASTIC AND AS AN OFFICER IN THE ARMY AND HAD WELCOMED ME IN THE HIGHEST SOCIETY

name: 3170-137482-0002.flac
words: I FELT THAT IN MY FIRST PROFESSION AS I WAS NOT BLESSED WITH THE VOCATION NECESSARY TO IT I SHOULD HAVE SUCCEEDED ONLY BY DINT OF HYPOCRISY AND I SHOULD HAVE BEEN DESPICABLE IN MY OWN ESTIMATION EVEN IF I HAD SEEN THE PURPLE MANTLE ON MY SHOULDERS FOR THE GREATEST DIGNITIES CANNOT SILENCE A MAN'S OWN CONSCIENCE

name: 3170-137482-0003.flac
words: BESIDES I WAS OF OPINION THAT A MAN'S PROFESSION WHATEVER IT MIGHT BE OUGHT TO SUPPLY HIM WITH ENOUGH MONEY TO SATISFY ALL HIS WANTS AND THE VERY POOR PAY OF AN OFFICER WOULD NEVER HAVE BEEN SUFFICIENT TO COVER MY EXPENSES BECAUSE MY EDUCATION HAD GIVEN ME GREATER WANTS THAN THOSE OF OFFICERS IN GENERAL

name: 3170-137482-0004.flac
words: OUR SCANDALOUS PROCEEDINGS OFTEN EXPOSED US TO THE GREATEST DANGER

words: THIS IS THE AMUSING ADVENTURE WHICH CLOSED OUR EXPLOITS

name: 3170-137482-0024.flac
words: THINKING I HAD A RIGHT TO WATCH THE SICK MAN I SETTLED MYSELF NEAR HIS BED TO GIVE HIM EVERY CARE HE REQUIRED

words: MEANWHILE HOW FARED IT WITH THE FLOWERS

name: 6319-275224-0013.flac
words: OH THAT SHE WERE ONCE MORE CLIMBING UP THE FRIENDLY FIR POLE

name: 6319-275224-0014.flac
words: THE HONEYSUCKLE ESCAPED NO BETTER AND THE CARNATION WAS READY TO DIE OF VEXATION AT FINDING THAT HER COVETED FREEDOM HAD LEVELLED HER TO THE DIRT

name: 6319-275224-0015.flac
words: BEFORE THE DAY CLOSED THE GARDENER CAME WHISTLING FROM HIS FARM WORK TO LOOK OVER HIS PRETTY CHARGES

name: 6319-275224-0016.flac
words: BUT FOR THE SIGHT THAT AWAITED HIM HE WAS NOT PREPARED AT ALL

name: 6319-275224-0017.flac
words: WEEDS MEANWHILE SPRANG UP AND A DREARY CONFUSION REIGNED IN THE ONCE ORDERLY AND BRILLIANT LITTLE GARDEN

name: 6319-275224-0018.flac
words: THE MISTRESS HAD RETURNED AND THE YOUNG LADY WAS WITH HER AND HURRIED AT ONCE TO HER FAVOURITE GARDEN

name: 6319-275224-0019.flac
words: IN THIS POSITION SHE REMAINED UNTIL A GENTLE HAND WAS LAID UPON HER SHOULDER

name: 6319-275224-0020.flac
words: I AM NOT THINKING ABOUT THE GARDEN MAMMA REPLIED THE YOUNG GIRL WITHOUT LIFTING UP HER FACE WE CAN PLANT NEW FLOWERS AND TIE UP EVEN SOME OF THESE AFRESH

name: 6319-57405-0000.flac
words: IN THOSE VERY EARLY TIMES THERE WAS A MAN NAMED DEUCALION AND HE WAS THE SON OF PROMETHEUS

name: 6319-57405-0001.flac
words: AFTER JUPITER HAD BOUND PROMETHEUS ON MOUNT CAUCASUS AND HAD SENT DISEASES AND CARES INTO THE WORLD MEN BECAME VERY VERY WICKED

name: 6319-57405-0002.flac
words: THESE MEN HE SAID TO HIS MIGHTY COMPANY ARE NOTHING BUT A SOURCE OF TROUBLE

name: 6319-57405-0003.flac
words: BUT MEN KEPT ON FIGHTING AND ROBBING EVEN WHILE THE RAIN WAS POURING DOWN AND THE SEA WAS COMING UP OVER THE LAND

name: 6319-57405-0004.flac
words: NO ONE BUT DEUCALION THE SON OF PROMETHEUS WAS READY FOR SUCH A STORM

name: 6319-57405-0005.flac
words: THE DAY IS COMING SAID PROMETHEUS WHEN JUPITER WILL SEND A FLOOD TO DESTROY MANKIND FROM THE EARTH

name: 6319-57405-0006.flac
words: BUT DEUCALION AND PYRRHA WERE VERY SAD FOR THEY KNEW THAT THEY WERE THE ONLY PERSONS WHO WERE LEFT ALIVE IN ALL THE LAND

name: 6319-57405-0007.flac
words: IS THERE ANYTHING THAT YOU WISH HE ASKED

name: 6319-57405-0008.flac
words: WE SHOULD LIKE ABOVE ALL THINGS SAID DEUCALION TO SEE THIS LAND FULL OF PEOPLE ONCE MORE FOR WITHOUT NEIGHBORS AND FRIENDS THE WORLD IS A VERY LONELY PLACE INDEED

name: 6319-57405-0009.flac
words: GO ON DOWN THE MOUNTAIN SAID MERCURY AND AS YOU GO CAST THE BONES OF YOUR MOTHER OVER YOUR SHOULDERS BEHIND YOU AND WITH THESE WORDS HE LEAPED INTO THE AIR AND WAS SEEN NO MORE

name: 6319-57405-0010.flac
words: WHAT DID HE MEAN ASKED PYRRHA

name: 6319-57405-0011.flac
words: SURELY I DO NOT KNOW SAID DEUCALION

name: 6319-57405-0012.flac
words: WHEN AT LAST THEY REACHED THE PLAIN THEY FOUND THEMSELVES AT THE HEAD OF A NOBLE COMPANY OF HUMAN BEINGS ALL EAGER TO SERVE THEM

name: 6319-64726-0000.flac
words: WHEN AT LAST THE QUEEN GAVE BIRTH TO A DAUGHTER THE KING WAS SO OVERJOYED THAT HE GAVE A GREAT CHRISTENING FEAST THE LIKE OF WHICH HAD NEVER BEFORE BEEN KNOWN

name: 6319-64726-0001.flac
words: ONE OF THE YOUNG FAIRIES OVERHEARING HER AND FANCYING SHE MIGHT WORK SOME MISCHIEF TO THE LITTLE BABY WENT AND HID HERSELF BEHIND THE HANGINGS IN THE HALL SO AS TO BE ABLE TO HAVE THE LAST WORD AND UNDO ANY HARM THE OLD FAIRY MIGHT WISH TO WORK

name: 6319-64726-0002.flac
words: THE TURN OF THE OLD FAIRY HAD NOW COME AND SHE DECLARED WHILE HER HEAD SHOOK WITH MALICE THAT THE PRINCESS SHOULD PIERCE HER HAND WITH A SPINDLE AND DIE OF THE WOUND

name: 6319-64726-0003.flac
words: IT IS TRUE I CANNOT ENTIRELY UNDO WHAT MY ELDER HAS DONE

name: 6319-64726-0004.flac
words: NOW FIFTEEN YEARS AFTER THE PRINCESS WAS BORN SHE WAS WITH THE KING AND QUEEN AT ONE OF THEIR CASTLES AND AS SHE WAS RUNNING ABOUT BY HERSELF SHE CAME TO A LITTLE CHAMBER AT THE TOP OF A TOWER AND THERE SAT AN HONEST OLD WOMAN SPINNING FOR SHE HAD NEVER HEARD OF THE KING'S EDICT

name: 6319-64726-0005.flac
words: SHE HAD NO SOONER TAKEN UP THE SPINDLE THAN BEING HASTY AND CARELESS SHE PIERCED HER HAND WITH THE POINT OF IT AND FAINTED AWAY

name: 6319-64726-0006.flac
words: HE KNEW THAT SHE WOULD NOT AWAKE FOR A HUNDRED YEARS

name: 6319-64726-0007.flac
words: ONE SAID IT WAS AN ENCHANTED CASTLE ANOTHER THAT WITCHES LIVED THERE BUT MOST BELIEVED THAT IT WAS OCCUPIED BY A GREAT OGRE WHICH CARRIED THITHER ALL THE CHILDREN HE COULD CATCH AND ATE THEM UP ONE AT A TIME FOR NOBODY COULD GET AT HIM THROUGH THE WOOD

name: 6319-64726-0008.flac
words: THE YOUNG PRINCE AT THESE WORDS FELT HIMSELF ON FIRE

name: 6319-64726-0009.flac
words: SCARCELY HAD HE COME TO THE WOOD WHEN ALL THE TREES AND THORNS WHICH HAD MADE SUCH AN IMPENETRABLE THICKET OPENED ON ONE SIDE AND THE OTHER TO OFFER HIM A PATH

name: 6319-64726-0010.flac
words: HE ENTERED A LARGE FORECOURT AND STOOD STILL WITH AMAZEMENT AND AWE

name: 6319-64726-0011.flac
words: BUT THE FACES OF THE MEN WERE ROSY AND THE GOBLETS BY THEM HAD A FEW DROPS OF WINE LEFT

name: 6319-64726-0012.flac
words: HE ENTERED THE GUARD ROOM THERE THE GUARDS STOOD DRAWN UP IN LINE WITH CARBINES AT THEIR SHOULDERS BUT THEY WERE SOUND ASLEEP

name: 6319-64726-0013.flac
words: HE PASSED THROUGH ONE APARTMENT AFTER ANOTHER WHERE WERE LADIES AND GENTLEMEN ASLEEP IN THEIR CHAIRS OR STANDING

name: 6319-64726-0014.flac
words: I HAVE WAITED LONG FOR YOU

name: 6319-64726-0015.flac
words: THEY TALKED FOR FOUR HOURS AND HAD NOT THEN SAID HALF THAT WAS IN THEIR HEADS TO SAY

name: 6319-64726-0016.flac
words: MEANWHILE ALL THE REST OF THE PEOPLE IN THE CASTLE HAD BEEN WAKENED AT THE SAME MOMENT AS THE PRINCESS AND THEY WERE NOW EXTREMELY HUNGRY

name: 6319-64726-0017.flac
words: THE LADY IN WAITING BECAME VERY IMPATIENT AND AT LENGTH ANNOUNCED TO THE PRINCESS THAT THEY ALL WAITED FOR HER

name: 6319-64726-0018.flac
words: THEN THE PRINCE TOOK THE PRINCESS BY THE HAND SHE WAS DRESSED IN GREAT SPLENDOUR BUT HE DID NOT HINT THAT SHE LOOKED AS HE HAD SEEN PICTURES OF HIS GREAT GRANDMOTHER LOOK HE THOUGHT HER ALL THE MORE CHARMING FOR THAT

name: 6319-64726-0019.flac
words: THE VIOLINS AND HAUT BOYS PLAYED OLD BUT EXCELLENT PIECES OF MUSIC AND AFTER SUPPER TO LOSE NO TIME THE GRAND ALMONER MARRIED THE ROYAL LOVERS IN THE CHAPEL OF THE CASTLE

name: 6319-64726-0020.flac
words: HE TURNED TO SHOW THEM THE CASTLE BUT BEHOLD

name: 2428-83699-0000.flac
words: I IMAGINE THERE WERE SEVERAL KINDS OF OLD FASHIONED CHRISTMASES BUT IT COULD HARDLY BE WORSE THAN A CHOP IN MY CHAMBERS OR HORROR OF HORRORS AT THE CLUB OR MY COUSIN LUCY'S NOTION OF WHAT SHE CALLS THE FESTIVE SEASON

name: 2428-83699-0001.flac
words: FESTIVE YES

name: 2428-83699-0002.flac
words: THE REPLY WAS WRITTEN IN A SPRAWLING FEMININE HAND IT WAS A LITTLE VAGUE

name: 2428-83699-0003.flac
words: IT APPEARED THAT THE TERMS WOULD BE FIVE GUINEAS BUT THERE WAS NO MENTION OF THE LENGTH OF TIME WHICH THAT FEE WOULD COVER

name: 2428-83699-0004.flac
words: THE WHOLE THING WAS A TRIFLE ODD

name: 2428-83699-0005.flac
words: THERE WAS NOTHING SAID ABOUT THE SORT OF ACCOMMODATION WHICH WOULD BE PROVIDED NOTHING ABOUT THE KIND OF ESTABLISHMENT WHICH WAS MAINTAINED OR THE TABLE WHICH WAS KEPT

name: 2428-83699-0006.flac
words: NOW IT IS A REMARKABLE THING THAT I HAVE ALWAYS HAD AN EXTRAORDINARY PREDILECTION FOR THE NAME MADGE I DO NOT KNOW WHY

name: 2428-83699-0007.flac
words: I HAVE NEVER KNOWN A MADGE AND YET FROM MY BOYHOOD UPWARD I HAVE DESIRED TO MEET ONE

name: 2428-83699-0008.flac
words: UNDER SUCH CIRCUMSTANCES SHE WAS HARDLY LIKELY TO BE LIVELY HERSELF BUT HER NAME WAS MADGE AND IT WAS THE ACCIDENT OF HER CHRISTIAN NAME WHICH DECIDED ME TO GO

name: 2428-83699-0009.flac
words: I HAD NO ILLUSIONS

name: 2428-83699-0010.flac
words: I DID NOT EXPECT A PRINCELY ENTERTAINMENT

name: 2428-83699-0011.flac
words: ALL NIGHT IT HAD BEEN BLOWING AND RAINING

name: 2428-83699-0012.flac
words: I FELT QUITE LIVELY MYSELF AS I MINGLED WITH THE CHRISTMAS CROWD LOOKING FOR THINGS WHICH MIGHT NOT TURN OUT TO BE ABSOLUTELY PREPOSTEROUS

name: 2428-83699-0013.flac
words: I EVEN BOUGHT SOMETHING FOR MADGE I MEAN MISSUS WILSON

name: 2428-83699-0014.flac
words: IT WAS A HORRIBLE JOURNEY

name: 2428-83699-0015.flac
words: HE WAS IMPERVIOUS TO REASON

name: 2428-83699-0016.flac
words: IT IS SOME SATISFACTION FOR ME TO BE ABLE TO REFLECT THAT I MADE IT WARM FOR THE OFFICIALS HOWEVER COLD I MIGHT HAVE BEEN MYSELF

name: 2428-83699-0017.flac
words: WHEN AT LAST I REACHED CROFTON MY JOURNEY'S END IT TURNED OUT THAT THE STATION STAFF CONSISTED OF A HALF WITTED INDIVIDUAL WHO WAS STATIONMASTER PORTER AND CLERK COMBINED AND A HULKING LAD WHO DID WHATEVER ELSE THERE WAS TO DO

name: 2428-83699-0018.flac
words: NO ONE HAD COME TO MEET ME THE VILLAGE WAS ABOUT HALF A MILE AND HANGAR DENE THE HOUSE FOR WHICH MY STEPS WERE BENT ABOUT FOUR MILES BY THE ROAD HOW FAR IT WAS ACROSS PLOUGHED FIELDS MY INFORMANT DID NOT MENTION

name: 2428-83699-0019.flac
words: THERE WAS A TRAP AT THE BOY AND BLUNDERBUSS BUT THAT REQUIRED FETCHING

name: 2428-83699-0020.flac
words: WHEN THE TRAP DID APPEAR IT LOOKED TO ME UNCOMMONLY LIKE AN OPEN SPRING CART

name: 2428-83699-0021.flac
words: IN IT I WAS DEPOSITED WITH MY LUGGAGE

name: 2428-83699-0022.flac
words: I DID NOT KNOW WHAT HE MEANT

name: 2428-83699-0023.flac
words: I DID NOT ASK I WAS BEYOND IT

name: 2428-83699-0024.flac
words: I WAS CHILLED TO THE BONE WET TIRED HUNGRY

name: 2428-83699-0025.flac
words: I HAD LONG BEEN WISHING THAT AN OLD FASHIONED CHRISTMAS HAD BEEN COMPLETELY EXTINCT BEFORE I HAD THOUGHT OF ADVENTURING IN QUEST OF ONE

name: 2428-83699-0026.flac
words: HERE WE BE THAT MIGHT BE SO

name: 2428-83699-0027.flac
words: THERE BE THE DOOR IN FRONT OF YOU YOU GO UP THREE STEPS IF YOU CAN FIND EM

name: 2428-83699-0028.flac
words: THERE'S A KNOCKER IF NONE OF EM HAVEN'T TWISTED IT OFF

name: 2428-83699-0029.flac
words: THERE APPEARED TO BE NO KNOCKER THOUGH WHETHER IT HAD BEEN TWISTED OFF WAS MORE THAN I COULD SAY

name: 2428-83699-0030.flac
words: NO ANSWER THOUGH I ALLOWED A MORE THAN DECENT INTERVAL

name: 2428-83699-0031.flac
words: BETTER RING AGAIN SUGGESTED THE DRIVER HARD

name: 2428-83699-0032.flac
words: MAYBE THEY'RE UP TO SOME OF THEIR GAMES AND WANTS ROUSING

name: 2428-83699-0033.flac
words: THE BELL REVERBERATED THROUGH WHAT SEEMED LIKE AN EMPTY HOUSE

name: 2428-83699-0034.flac
words: PRESENTLY FEET WERE HEARD ADVANCING ALONG THE PASSAGE SEVERAL PAIRS IT SEEMED AND A LIGHT GLEAMED THROUGH THE WINDOW OVER THE DOOR

name: 2428-83699-0035.flac
words: A VOICE INQUIRED WHO'S THERE

name: 2428-83699-0036.flac
words: THE INFORMATION WAS GREETED WITH WHAT SOUNDED UNCOMMONLY LIKE A CHORUS OF LAUGHTER

name: 2428-83699-0037.flac
words: THERE WAS A RUSH OF RETREATING FEET AN EXPOSTULATING VOICE THEN DARKNESS AGAIN AND SILENCE

name: 2428-83699-0038.flac
words: WHO LIVES HERE ARE THE PEOPLE MAD

name: 2428-83699-0039.flac
words: I TOLLED THE BELL AGAIN

name: 2428-83699-0040.flac
words: AFTER A VAST AMOUNT OF UNFASTENING THE DOOR WAS OPENED AND ON THE THRESHOLD THERE STOOD A GIRL WITH A LIGHTED CANDLE IN HER HAND

name: 2428-83699-0041.flac
words: I'M MISTER CHRISTOPHER FROM LONDON

name: 2428-83699-0042.flac
words: WE'VE LOST THE KEY OF THE CELLAR AND THERE'S NOTHING OUT EXCEPT WATER AND I DON'T THINK YOU'D CARE FOR THAT

name: 2428-83705-0000.flac
words: HER FATHER IS A MOST REMARKABLE PERSON TO SAY THE LEAST

name: 2428-83705-0001.flac
words: BUT IT IS QUITE PLAIN TO ME THAT ALL THE ARRANGEMENTS FOR MY WEDDING ARE GOING TO BE MADE BY THE SNELLINGS

name: 2428-83705-0002.flac
words: I DO NOT KNOW WHEN IT IS GOING TO BE BUT IT WILL BE EITHER NEXT WEEK OR THE WEEK AFTER CERTAINLY AT THE EARLIEST POSSIBLE MOMENT AND I SHOULDN'T BE AT ALL SURPRISED TO LEARN THAT ALL MARY ANN'S THINGS HAD BEEN ALREADY BOUGHT AND PERHAPS SOME OF THEM MARKED

name: 2428-83705-0003.flac
words: IT IS MOST DELIGHTFUL

name: 2428-83705-0004.flac
words: IT MIGHT JUST AS WELL BE SOME ONE ELSE'S WEDDING SO UNIMPORTANT IS THE PART WHICH I AM SET TO PLAY IN IT

name: 2428-83705-0005.flac
words: FOR INSTANCE LOOK AT THEIR BEHAVIOUR IN THE MATTER OF THE RING

name: 2428-83705-0006.flac
words: THE ACCIDENT IN QUESTION OCCURRED UPON THE SUNDAY EVENING

name: 2428-83705-0007.flac
words: THE GIRL IS FRETTING BUT YOU DON'T SEEM TO NOTICE IT

name: 2428-83705-0008.flac
words: I GASPED POSITIVELY GASPED

name: 2428-83705-0009.flac
words: THAT'S IT ON YOUR ACCOUNT

name: 2428-83705-0010.flac
words: FROM A COUSIN OF OURS WHO'S IN THAT LINE

name: 2428-83705-0011.flac
words: I NEVER SAW PEOPLE LIKE THE SNELLINGS FOR POSSESSING RELATIVES IN ALL SORTS OF LINES

name: 2428-83705-0012.flac
words: I WAS PERSUADED THAT SOMEBODY BESIDES THAT COUSIN GOT A PROFIT OUT OF MARY ANN'S ENGAGEMENT RING BUT I HANDED OVER THE AMOUNT

name: 2428-83705-0013.flac
words: IT IS FROM HER ACTION IN THAT MATTER THAT MY SUSPICION SPRINGS

name: 2428-83705-0014.flac
words: THERE SHE OWNS A COTTAGE OR IT MAY BE A PIGSTYE FOR ALL I KNOW

name: 2428-83705-0015.flac
words: WHEN SHE HEARD OF MY ENGAGEMENT WITH MARY ANN SHE WROTE AND SUGGESTED THAT WE SHOULD SPEND OUR HONEYMOON IN HER COTTAGE OR PIGSTYE AND THAT I SHOULD PAY HER RENT FOR IT

name: 2428-83705-0016.flac
words: THERE WERE NO SIGNS OF FALTERING ABOUT HER FLOW OF LANGUAGE

name: 2428-83705-0017.flac
words: I FOUND THAT AS A WOMAN OF BUSINESS SHE WAS BEYOND ALL MY EXPECTATIONS

name: 2428-83705-0018.flac
words: IT TURNED OUT THAT SHE HAD A LITTLE MONEY OF HER OWN ABOUT A HUNDRED AND THIRTY POUNDS A YEAR

name: 2428-83705-0019.flac
words: AND OF COURSE I HAD MY EXPECTATIONS AND SHE HAD HERS

name: 2428-83705-0020.flac
words: IT WAS PLAIN THAT TOGETHER WE SHOULD MANAGE MOST COMFORTABLY DELIGHTFULLY IN FACT

name: 2428-83705-0021.flac
words: I SHALL MAKE PAPA GIVE ME FIVE HUNDRED POUNDS AT LEAST

name: 2428-83705-0022.flac
words: A BIRD IN THE HAND IS WORTH TWO IN A BUSH' AND IT WILL BE SOMETHING TO HAVE BY US

name: 2428-83705-0023.flac
words: I KNOW WHAT MAMMA CAN AFFORD TO GIVE AND I WILL SEE SHE GIVES IT

name: 2428-83705-0024.flac
words: AND I WILL SEE THAT THERE IS NO SHIRKING ABOUT THE BOYS OR ABOUT THE GIRLS EITHER

name: 2428-83705-0025.flac
words: I HAVE DRAWN UP A LIST OF ALL THE PEOPLE WHO OUGHT TO GIVE US A PRESENT AND I SHALL TELL THEM WHAT THEY OUGHT TO GIVE IT WON'T BE MY FAULT IF I DON'T GET IT

name: 2428-83705-0026.flac
words: OF COURSE THERE ARE SOME PEOPLE WITH WHOM YOU CAN'T BE PERFECTLY PLAIN BUT I SHALL BE AS PLAIN AS I CAN THERE'S A WAY AND A MANNER OF DOING THAT KIND OF THING

name: 2428-83705-0027.flac
words: HERS HAS BEEN PRODIGIOUS

name: 2428-83705-0028.flac
words: SHE HAS A KNACK OF GETTING PEOPLE TO DO WHAT SHE WISHES AND TO GIVE HER WHAT SHE WANTS WHICH IS A LITTLE SHORT OF MIRACULOUS

name: 2428-83705-0029.flac
words: I NOTICE THAT THEY ARE GENERALLY PERSONS WHO HAVE ALREADY TENDERED THEIR OFFERINGS

name: 2428-83705-0030.flac
words: THE FACT OF HAVING GIVEN MARY ANN A WEDDING PRESENT SEEMS TO FILL THEM WITH A FEELING OF RANCOROUS ACIDITY WHICH TO ME IS INEXPLICABLE

name: 2428-83705-0031.flac
words: SUCH IS THE SELFISHNESS OF HUMAN NATURE

name: 2428-83705-0032.flac
words: BUT WHY ON THAT ACCOUNT THEY SHOULD PITY ME I ALTOGETHER FAIL TO UNDERSTAND

name: 2428-83705-0033.flac
words: WE HAVE ALL BEEN GIVING MARY ANN PRESENTS AND I SUPPOSE YOU MISTER WHITING HAVE BEEN GIVING HER SOMETHING TOO

name: 2428-83705-0034.flac
words: THAT WAS WHAT MISSUS MACPHERSON SAID TO ME ONLY THE OTHER DAY

name: 2428-83705-0035.flac
words: AND WHAT INQUIRED MISSUS MACPHERSON HAS MARY ANN GIVEN YOU HER LOVE

name: 2428-83705-0036.flac
words: SOMEONE SNIGGERED

name: 2428-83705-0037.flac
words: I CANNOT PRETEND TO EXPLAIN WHY EXCEPT ON THE SUPPOSITION THAT ROMANCE IS DEAD AT LEAST IN THAT CIRCLE OF SOCIETY IN WHICH THE SNELLINGS MOVE

name: 2428-83705-0038.flac
words: AS IT IS UNLESS I AM MISTAKEN SOME OF THE RENDING WILL BE ON OUR SIDE AND THEY KNOW IT

name: 2428-83705-0039.flac
words: P S THE CARDS ARE OUT FOR THE WEDDING

name: 2428-83705-0040.flac
words: WE ARE GOING FOR OUR HONEYMOON TO ITALY AND THE SOUTH OF FRANCE

name: 2428-83705-0041.flac
words: A SECOND COUSIN OF MARY ANN'S IS IN THE COOK'S TOURS LINE

name: 2428-83705-0042.flac
words: HE HAS GIVEN US FREE PASSES ALL THE WAY TO THE END OF OUR JOURNEY AND ALL THE WAY BACK AGAIN AND COUPONS FOR FREE BOARD AND LODGING AT THE HOTEL IT'S A WEDDING PRESENT

name: 2428-83705-0043.flac
words: BESIDES WHICH WE CAN ALWAYS SELL THE COUPONS AND RAILWAY PASSES WHICH WE DON'T USE

name: 5694-64038-0000.flac
words: ADVANCE INTO TENNESSEE

name: 5694-64038-0001.flac
words: YANK SAYS WHAT YOU DOING JOHNNY

name: 5694-64038-0002.flac
words: WE PASSED AROUND ATLANTA CROSSED THE CHATTAHOOCHEE AND TRAVELED BACK OVER THE SAME ROUTE ON WHICH WE HAD MADE THE ARDUOUS CAMPAIGN UNDER JOE JOHNSTON

name: 5694-64038-0003.flac
words: OUTSIDE OF THESE OCCASIONAL REMINDERS WE COULD SEE NO EVIDENCE OF THE DESOLATION OF THE TRACK OF AN INVADING ARMY

name: 5694-64038-0004.flac
words: WE SAW THE UNITED STATES FLAG FLYING FROM THE RAMPARTS AND THOUGHT THAT YANK WOULD PROBABLY BE ASLEEP OR CATCHING LICE OR MAYBE ENGAGED IN A GAME OF SEVEN UP

name: 5694-64038-0005.flac
words: HE WALKED UP AND SAYS HELLO BOYS WHAT IS IT BOSS

name: 5694-64038-0006.flac
words: A YANKEE ALWAYS SAYS NAGER

name: 5694-64038-0007.flac
words: THEY PERSUADED ELOQUENTLY

name: 5694-64038-0008.flac
words: A MAN IN THE WELL

name: 5694-64038-0009.flac
words: THE VOICE APPEARED TO BE OVERHEAD

name: 5694-64038-0010.flac
words: RIGHT BEFORE ME I SAW THE LONG DRY GRASS ALL BENDING TOWARD A COMMON CENTER AND I KNEW THAT IT WAS AN OLD WELL AND THAT MY COMRADE HAD FALLEN IN IT

name: 5694-64038-0011.flac
words: BUT HOW TO GET HIM OUT WAS THE UNSOLVED PROBLEM

name: 5694-64038-0012.flac
words: THE POOR FELLOW STAYED IN THAT WELL ALL NIGHT

name: 5694-64038-0013.flac
words: WE LOOKED ALL AROUND AND THOUGHT THAT THE COAST WAS CLEAR

name: 5694-64038-0014.flac
words: I DON'T THINK HIS GUN WAS LOADED THOUGH BECAUSE WE DID NOT HEAR THE BALL WHISTLE

name: 5694-64038-0015.flac
words: WE WALKED OVER THIS FLOATING BRIDGE AND SOON FOUND OURSELVES ON THE TENNESSEE SIDE OF TENNESSEE RIVER

name: 5694-64038-0016.flac
words: WE HAD BEEF FOR SUPPER THAT NIGHT

name: 5694-64038-0017.flac
words: HOW EVERY PULSE DID BEAT AND LEAP AND HOW EVERY HEART DID THROB WITH EMOTIONS OF JOY WHICH SEEMED NEARLY AKIN TO HEAVEN WHEN WE RECEIVED THE GLAD INTELLIGENCE OF OUR ONWARD MARCH TOWARD THE LAND OF PROMISE AND OF OUR LOVED ONES

name: 5694-64038-0018.flac
words: WE WERE INURED TO PRIVATIONS AND HARDSHIPS HAD BEEN UPON EVERY MARCH IN EVERY BATTLE IN EVERY SKIRMISH IN EVERY ADVANCE IN EVERY RETREAT IN EVERY VICTORY IN EVERY DEFEAT

name: 5694-64038-0019.flac
words: HE WANTED TO GO BY HOME AND TELL HIS WIFE AND CHILDREN GOOD BYE AND TO GET HIS CLOTHES IT WAS NO GO

name: 5694-64038-0020.flac
words: BUT AFTER AWHILE JIM SAYS GENTLEMEN AY GANNY THE LAW

name: 5694-64038-0021.flac
words: YOU SEE JIM KNOWED THE LAW

name: 5694-64038-0022.flac
words: THOSE OLD SOLDIERS HAD LONG LONG AGO FORGOTTEN ABOUT THAT OLD LAW OF THE LONG GONE PAST BUT JIM HAD TREASURED IT UP IN HIS MEMORY LO THESE MANY YEARS AND HE THOUGHT IT WOULD SERVE HIM NOW AS IT HAD NO DOUBT FREQUENTLY DONE IN THE PAST

name: 5694-64038-0023.flac
words: THE THIRD DAY IT WAS REPORTED THAT THE YANKEES HAD TAKEN POSITION ON THE MURFREESBORO PIKE

name: 5694-64038-0024.flac
words: A REGIMENT WAS SENT TO THE ATTACK IT WAS JIM'S REGIMENT

name: 5694-64038-0025.flac
words: HE HADN'T SEEN ANYTHING TO SHOOT AT BUT HE BLAZED AWAY HE LOADED AND FIRED THE SECOND TIME WHEN THEY WERE ORDERED TO RETREAT

name: 5694-64025-0000.flac
words: SHILOH

name: 5694-64025-0001.flac
words: THIS WAS THE FIRST BIG BATTLE IN WHICH OUR REGIMENT HAD EVER BEEN ENGAGED

name: 5694-64025-0002.flac
words: I DO NOT PRETEND TO TELL OF WHAT COMMAND DISTINGUISHED ITSELF OF HEROES OF BLOOD AND WOUNDS OF SHRIEKS AND GROANS OF BRILLIANT CHARGES OF CANNON CAPTURED ET CETERA

name: 5694-64025-0003.flac
words: ABOUT DAYLIGHT ON SUNDAY MORNING CHALMERS BRIGADE RELIEVED GLADDEN'S

name: 5694-64025-0004.flac
words: AS GLADDEN RODE BY US A COURIER RODE UP AND TOLD HIM SOMETHING

name: 5694-64025-0005.flac
words: ON SUNDAY MORNING A CLEAR BEAUTIFUL AND STILL DAY THE ORDER WAS GIVEN FOR THE WHOLE ARMY TO ADVANCE AND TO ATTACK IMMEDIATELY

name: 5694-64025-0006.flac
words: WE WERE SUPPORTING AN ALABAMA BRIGADE

name: 5694-64025-0007.flac
words: THAT'S RIGHT MY BRAVE FIRST TENNESSEE GIVE EM HAIL COLUMBIA

name: 5694-64025-0008.flac
words: THE FACT WAS KEPT FROM THE TROOPS

name: 5694-64025-0009.flac
words: WE HAD TO PASS OVER THE GROUND WHERE TROOPS HAD BEEN FIGHTING ALL DAY

name: 5694-64025-0010.flac
words: I HAD HEARD AND READ OF BATTLEFIELDS SEEN PICTURES OF BATTLEFIELDS OF HORSES AND MEN OF CANNON AND WAGONS ALL JUMBLED TOGETHER WHILE THE GROUND WAS STREWN WITH DEAD AND DYING AND WOUNDED BUT I MUST CONFESS THAT I NEVER REALIZED THE POMP AND CIRCUMSTANCE OF THE THING CALLED GLORIOUS WAR UNTIL I SAW THIS

name: 5694-64025-0011.flac
words: I HAD BEEN FEELING MEAN ALL THE MORNING AS IF I HAD STOLEN A SHEEP BUT WHEN THE ORDER TO CHARGE WAS GIVEN I GOT HAPPY

name: 5694-64025-0012.flac
words: OFFICERS COULD NOT CURB THE MEN TO KEEP IN LINE

name: 5694-64025-0013.flac
words: ON MONDAY THE TIDE WAS REVERSED

name: 5694-64025-0014.flac
words: BUT AS I SAID BEFORE READER A PRIVATE SOLDIER IS BUT AN AUTOMATON AND KNOWS NOTHING OF WHAT IS GOING ON AMONG THE GENERALS AND I AM ONLY GIVING THE CHRONICLES OF LITTLE THINGS AND EVENTS THAT CAME UNDER MY OWN OBSERVATION AS I SAW THEM THEN AND REMEMBER THEM NOW

name: 5694-64025-0015.flac
words: SHOULD YOU DESIRE TO FIND OUT MORE ABOUT THE BATTLE I REFER YOU TO HISTORY

name: 5694-64025-0016.flac
words: ABOUT THE TIME HE PULLED TRIGGER A STRAY BALL FROM SOME DIRECTION STRUCK HIM IN THE SIDE AND HE FELL OFF DEAD AND HIS HORSE BECOMING FRIGHTENED GALLOPED OFF DRAGGING HIM THROUGH THE CONFEDERATE LINES

name: 5694-64025-0017.flac
words: ON MONDAY MORNING I TOO CAPTURED ME A MULE

name: 5694-64025-0018.flac
words: HE WAS WISE IN HIS OWN CONCEIT

name: 5694-64025-0019.flac
words: I FREQUENTLY THOUGHT IT WOULD BE PLEASANT TO SPLIT THE DIFFERENCE WITH THAT MULE AND I WOULD GLADLY HAVE DONE SO IF I COULD HAVE GOTTEN ONE HALF OF HIS NO

name: 5694-64025-0020.flac
words: MULE DID NOT DESIRE TO CROSS WHILE I WAS TRYING TO PERSUADE HIM WITH A BIG STICK A ROCK IN HIS EAR AND A TWISTER ON HIS NOSE

name: 5694-64025-0021.flac
words: SO HE GOT A LARGE TWO INCH ROPE TIED ONE END AROUND THE MULE'S NECK AND THE OTHER TO THE CAISSON AND ORDERED THE DRIVER TO WHIP UP

name: 5694-64025-0022.flac
words: THE ROPE HOWEVER WAS STRONGER THAN THE MULE'S NO AND HE WAS FINALLY PREVAILED UPON BY THE STRENGTH OF THE ROPE TO CROSS THE CREEK

name: 5694-64025-0023.flac
words: ON MY TAKING THE ROPE OFF HE SHOOK HIMSELF AND SEEMED TO SAY YOU THINK THAT YOU ARE MIGHTY SMART FOLKS BUT YOU ARE A LEETLE TOO SMART

name: 5694-64029-0000.flac
words: WE REMAINED SEVERAL MONTHS BUT SOON WE WERE ON THE TRAMP AGAIN

name: 5694-64029-0001.flac
words: THE FEDERAL ARMY WAS CONCENTRATING AT NASHVILLE THERE WAS NO REST FOR THE WEARY

name: 5694-64029-0002.flac
words: OUR ARMY STOPPED AT MURFREESBORO

name: 5694-64029-0003.flac
words: FROM TIME TO TIME DIFFERENT REGIMENTS WERE SENT FORWARD TO DO PICKET DUTY

name: 5694-64029-0004.flac
words: THE YANKEE PICKET LINES WERE NOT A HALF MILE OFF

name: 5694-64029-0005.flac
words: I AM A VIDET YOU KNOW THE RESPONSIBILITY RESTING ON ME

name: 5694-64029-0006.flac
words: SAYS HE I WOULD NOT TRUST A SECESH ON HIS WORD OATH OR BOND MARCH I SAY

name: 5694-64029-0007.flac
words: I SOON FOUND OUT THAT HE HAD CAUGHT SIGHT OF THE RELIEF ON THE ROAD AND WAS AFRAID TO SHOOT I QUICKLY MADE UP MY MIND

name: 5694-64029-0008.flac
words: MY GUN WAS AT MY FEET AND ONE STEP WOULD GET IT

name: 5694-64029-0009.flac
words: I MADE A QUICK GLANCE OVER MY SHOULDER AND GRABBED AT MY GUN

name: 5694-64029-0010.flac
words: HE DIVINED MY MOTIVE AND FIRED THE BALL MISSED ITS AIM

name: 5694-64029-0011.flac
words: I THINK WE MUST HAVE KILLED A GOOD MANY IN THE OLD FIELD BECAUSE WE WERE FIRING ALL THE TIME AT THE SOLID LINE AS THEY ADVANCED UPON US

name: 5694-64029-0012.flac
words: WE KEPT FALLING BACK AND FIRING ALL DAY AND WERE RELIEVED BY ANOTHER REGIMENT ABOUT DARK WE REJOINED OUR REGIMENT

name: 5694-64029-0013.flac
words: LINE OF BATTLE WAS FORMED ON THE NORTH BANK OF STONE'S RIVER ON THE YANKEE SIDE

name: 5694-64029-0014.flac
words: BAD GENERALSHIP I THOUGHT IT WAS CHRISTMAS

name: 5694-64029-0015.flac
words: THE PRIVATE COULD BUT HE WAS NO GENERAL YOU SEE

name: 5694-64029-0016.flac
words: I CALLED LIEUTENANT COLONEL FRIERSON'S ATTENTION TO THE YANKEES AND HE REMARKED WELL I DON'T KNOW WHETHER THEY ARE YANKEES OR NOT BUT IF THEY ARE THEY WILL COME OUT OF THERE MIGHTY QUICK

name: 5694-64029-0017.flac
words: THE YANKEES MARCHED OVER THE HILL OUT OF SIGHT

name: 5694-64029-0018.flac
words: WE WERE ORDERED FORWARD TO THE ATTACK

name: 5694-64029-0019.flac
words: WE WERE RIGHT UPON THE YANKEE LINE ON THE WILKERSON TURNPIKE

name: 5694-64029-0020.flac
words: WE WERE NOT TWENTY YARDS OFF FROM THE YANKEES AND THEY WERE POURING THE HOT SHOT AND SHELLS RIGHT INTO OUR RANKS AND EVERY MAN WAS YELLING AT THE TOP OF HIS VOICE CEASE FIRING YOU ARE FIRING ON YOUR OWN MEN CEASE FIRING YOU ARE FIRING ON YOUR OWN MEN

name: 5694-64029-0021.flac
words: OAKLEY COLOR BEARER OF THE FOURTH TENNESSEE REGIMENT RAN RIGHT UP IN THE MIDST OF THE YANKEE LINE WITH HIS COLORS BEGGING HIS MEN TO FOLLOW

name: 5694-64029-0022.flac
words: THE LEADEN HAIL STORM SWEPT THEM OFF THE FIELD THEY FELL BACK AND RE FORMED

name: 5694-64029-0023.flac
words: WE WERE AT THAT TIME AT LEAST A HUNDRED YARDS IN ADVANCE OF THE BRIGADE CHEATHAM ALL THE TIME CALLING UPON THE MEN TO COME ON

name: 5694-64029-0024.flac
words: I SAW AND FELT THAT HE WAS NOT FIGHTING FOR GLORY BUT THAT HE WAS FIGHTING FOR HIS COUNTRY BECAUSE HE LOVED THAT COUNTRY AND HE WAS WILLING TO GIVE HIS LIFE FOR HIS COUNTRY AND THE SUCCESS OF OUR CAUSE

name: 5694-64029-0025.flac
words: I THOUGHT IT HAD BEEN TORN FROM MY SHOULDER

name: 5694-64029-0026.flac
words: AS I WENT BACK TO THE FIELD HOSPITAL I OVERTOOK ANOTHER MAN WALKING ALONG

name: 5694-64029-0027.flac
words: I LOOKED AT IT PRETTY CLOSE AND I SAID GREAT GOD

name: 5694-64029-0028.flac
words: HE WAS WALKING ALONG WHEN ALL AT ONCE HE DROPPED DOWN AND DIED WITHOUT A STRUGGLE OR A GROAN

name: 5694-64029-0029.flac
words: BUT I COULD NOT BEAR THE THOUGHT OF WEARING DEAD MEN'S SHOES

name: 5694-64029-0030.flac
words: HE WAS STONE DEAD BUT I DROPPED THAT FOOT QUICK

name: 5694-64029-0031.flac
words: BEFORE WE ARRIVED AT THE HOUSE WE SAW A BODY OF YANKEES APPROACHING AND AS WE STARTED TO RUN BACK THEY FIRED UPON US

name: 5694-64029-0032.flac
words: OUR PICKETS HAD RUN IN AND REPORTED A NIGHT ATTACK
